metadata.name: Seceda: Gateway to the Heavens
metadata.description:
After hours spent in a steady ascent, we reached the peak. My burning legs finally received their respite as we sat and looked to the horizon. 

Mountains surrounded us, their snow-capped peaks disappearing into the sky above. The valley below was filled with the rich green and yellow hues of summer, broken only by winding trails and quaint cabins resting on the slopes. 

We were alone, the clouds our only company. The soft wind whispered its secrets to us and lead the flowers in a joyous dance as we basked in the glory of Seceda. 

  ----------     ----------     ----------     ----------     ----------     

OWNING pieces of the "From Above" collection grants exclusive access to the 4K, 8 minute short film "Italy from Above," which features more footage from my 2021 adventure in a peaceful flight across the country.
